page.name: Woodchuck
page.description: This Woodchuck would chuck as much wood as a woodchuck COULD chuck if this Woodchuck could chuck wood.

page.description: A proud and sturdy blade, made in the style preferred by nobles and kings.

page.description: A fiery sword that will add the finishing touch to any battle.

page.description: This sword is the standard issue weapon for an officer of the Elven Army.

page.name: Static
page.description: Shuffle your feet, then charge!

page.description: A wicked blade designed for do-it-yourself surgery on the battlefield.

page.name: Earth Breaker
page.description: A powerful sword. The sight of it will make your enemies quake with fear.

page.name: Zhoom's Curved Blade
page.description: A sword of exotic design, made of a lightweight metal. It's the perfect weapon for the hard working hero who likes to move fast.

page.name: Boxing Ring
page.description: This ring was found in a Sneevil camp...and it still smells like it.

page.name: Fireproof Ring
page.description: Made of hard-fired black ceramic, this ring helps you slightly resist fiery attacks.

page.name: Heavy Ring
page.description: No idea what this ring is made of but it weighs as much as a brick.

page.name: Wooden Ring
page.description: This ring was lovingly carved from a single piece of wood and stained a warm amber color. It still smells faintly of rich exotic elven spices.

page.name: Chillfury
page.description: A cold light dances within the large crystal head atop this staff.

properties.description: A cold light dances within the large crystal head atop this staff.

page.name: Mooncalling Staff
page.description: A staff used long ago by a moon-worshiping tribe. It is said that on the right night you can call the moon down to advise you.

page.name: Stiletto
page.description: This slender blade is made for precision strikes. In skilled hands, it is deadly.

page.name: Hunting Knife
page.description: Scouts, rangers and hunters love this knife. It is a staple weapon for all who love to adventure in the woods.

page.name: Rusty Kukri
page.description: Your enemies better have their tetanus shots if you cut them with this kukri dagger!

page.name: Palladinum Blade
page.description: This blade was made from an element found to be effective at assisting paladins.  It gives an added resistance against darkness creatures and increases luck!

page.name: Viper's Tongue
page.description: The danger with this sword is not the razor-sharp edge, but the poison that coats it.  Remember to never hold your weapons by the blade or your serpents by the tail.

page.name: Asclepic Support Staff
page.description: A wandering healer found a young boy lying in the road, wounded.  Two snakes guarded him from attack by wild predators.  This staff was carved in honor of that myth.

properties.name: Asclepic Support Staff
properties.description: A wandering healer found a young boy lying in the road, wounded.  Two snakes guarded him from attack by wild predators.  This staff was carved in honor of that myth.

page.name: Shrunken Serpent Kris
page.description: This kris looks so serpentine you almost expect it to hiss when you hit things with it!

page.name: Frozen Starfire
page.description: Ancient magic whispers as the runes on this staff glow briefly and then fade.  If you listen closely, you can almost make out the secrets of the ages.  This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Gedaur
page.description: Whispered rumors claim this wand once served as a torch in an Elvish Queen's Hall. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Tarrir
page.description:
The flame contained in this blade once blazed in a torch held by a page attending an Elf Queen as she toured a bardic hall.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Tarrir

page.name: Rhunatoir
page.description:
It is said that an elven mage spelled the flame into this dagger with the instruction that it always light the way of a pure-hearted hero.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Giant's Silver Soupspoon
page.description: Great for soup if you're eight feet tall, or really handy for whacking enemies on the head if you're six feet tall or less.  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.description:

This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Hybrid Wand
page.description: A wandering gnome-magician-inventor gifted you with one of his latest hybrid inventions.  He said it will serve you well at mealtimes and in battle.

page.name: Pactogonal Blade
page.description: Forged by Yulgar in honor of Captain Rolith and the many brave deeds of his company of Knights, this blade pays homage to their heroic spirits!  This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Fairyfly Staff
page.description:
Playful marsh-fairies have been attracted to the crystal sitting atop this staff.  
This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: Fork of Destiny
page.description:
With this fork, you can take down even the toughest demon!  Might not want to try playing any instruments with it, though.  
This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.description:
This is the blade of Sir Pent, who guards the bridge where you once fought the hydra.
